title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Work AI that Works: Real Stories & Outcomes of Agentic AI  (AIM112)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 有效的工作AI：智能体AI的真实案例与成果 (AIM112)
abstract: AI at scale means more than chatbots—it’s agentic platforms that automate end-to-end workflows, securely handle your data, and deliver measurable outcomes. Join Glean for a showcase of forward-thinking leaders who leverage Agentic AI to reshape operations, increase agility, and support strategic planning while maintaining security and compliance. Hear how real companies deploy Glean agents at scale to drive productivity, deliver valuable insights, and automate repetitive or time-consuming tasks. Attendees will learn actionable frameworks for executive buy-in, adoption, and compliance monitoring, and see why Glean is recognized by Gartner, IDC, and Forrester for real value delivered to technology leaders. This presentation is brought to you by Glean, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 大规模AI不仅仅意味着聊天机器人——它是自动化端到端工作流程、安全处理数据并交付可衡量成果的智能体平台。加入Glean，展示前瞻性领导者如何利用智能体AI重塑运营、提高敏捷性并支持战略规划，同时保持安全性和合规性。了解真实公司如何大规模部署Glean智能体来提高生产力、提供有价值的洞察并自动化重复或耗时的任务。与会者将学习获得高管支持、采用和合规监控的可行框架，并了解为什么Glean被Gartner、IDC和Forrester认可为向技术领导者交付真正价值的解决方案。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Glean提供。
